short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vister extension to share content from your screen in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the Vister screen sharing browser extension that allows chrome users share their screens and created content during their classes and live events on Vister.
